Title: Relates to repeated instances of harassment giving rise to a charge of aggravated harassment in the second degree and harassment in the first degree
Summary: Relates to repeated instances of harassment giving rise to a charge of aggravated harassment in the second degree and harassment in the first degree; clarifies that the victim of such separate offenses does not need to be the same individual.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to repeated instances of harassment
